tool_description: Analyzes historical sales data to identify patterns, trends, and seasonality factors for demand forecasting.

product_ids.description: Product IDs to analyze sales history for

analysis_period_months.description: Number of months of sales history to analyze (1-36)

include_seasonality.description: Whether to include seasonal pattern analysis

error_messages: Insufficient sales data: Product must have at least 3 months of sales history for meaningful analysis.
Invalid analysis period: analysis_period_months must be between 1 and 36.
Product sales data unavailable: One or more products have no sales records in the specified period.
usage: Specify product IDs and analysis period to generate sales patterns and trends. Use include_seasonality to enable seasonal analysis for products with sufficient historical data.

sales_trends.description: Identified sales trend descriptions for each product

seasonal_factors.description: Seasonal adjustment factors for each month (12 values)

average_monthly_sales.description: Average monthly sales quantities for each product

volatility_scores.description: Sales volatility scores from 0-100 for each product
